content: complimentary pattern ellensburg cowl design by alyssa rasmussen no 1301 no 1325 no 1307 storm cloud a lilac bloom b pressed grapes c 50g hank mini hank mini hank no 1306 no 1322 no 1314 wild thyme d northern lights e deep velvet f mini hank mini hank mini hank no 1326 no 1305 mossy green g october sky h mini hank mini hank experience level - advanced beginner materials - woolstok worsted 100% fine highland wool 50g/123yds 1 hank - woolstok bundle 100% fine highland wool 5g/12yds 1 bundle - size 8 5mm 32 circular needle or size needed to obtain gauge - stitch marker - tapestry needle size ellensburg cowl no 202203 - one finished measurements design by alyssa rasmussen pattern - circumference 42 knit in woolstok worsted this cowl is full of texture and - height 9 color wear it as a single loop with a sweater or doubled under a coat for extra coziness gauge - in purl texture pattern 16 sts and 24 rnds = 4 abbreviations bobble bind off co cast on k knit complimentary pattern complimentary pattern k2tog knit 2 stitches together m marker ndl s needle s p purl patt pattern pm place marker pwise purlwise as if to purl repeat repeat round s round s sl slip st s stitch es tbl through the back loop decrease together wyib with yarn in back wyif with yarn in front yo yarn over * repeat the directions between the asterisks as many times as indicated special methods russian bobble k the first 2 sts decrease tbl slip_stitch back to left ndl pwise repeat steps until there is 1 st left cut the yarn and pull tightly through the last st notes in order to stay within specified yarn amounts check your gauge and leave tails no longer than 5 all sl sts are pwise cowl with a co 168 sts pm and join to work in the round being careful not to twist sts purl texture round 1 p round 2 k round 3 *k3 p3 repeat from * to end rnds 4-6 k round 7 *p3 k3 repeat from * to end rnds 8-10 k repeat rnds 3-10 one more time blue sky fibers blue sky fibers color loop finishing round 1 with b k weave in ends block as desired round 2 with b k care instructions hand wash or dry clean wash in tepid round 3 with c *slwyib k1 repeat from * to end water using a mild soap do not twist shape and dry flat round 4 with c *slwyif p1 repeat from * to end on a towel store folded do not hang round 5 with c k round 6 with c k round 7 with b *k1 slwyib repeat from * to end round 8 with b *p1 slwyif repeat from * to end repeat rnds 1-8 one more time then repeat rnds 1-4 once round 1 with d k round 2 with d k round
